text: Masashi Chikazawa (born June 26, 1982) is a former baseball player from Japan. Masashi Chikazawa played in the Japan Pacific League for the Osaka Kintetsu Buffaloes.https://www.baseball- reference.com/register/player.cgi?id=chikaz001mas He later played for Reno.http://www.cbssports.com/mlb/players/playerpage/292820/masashi-chikazawa ==References== Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Living people Category:1982 births
title: Masashi Chikazawa
